mapper.select: select id,userCardNum,userName,bookISBN,bookName,borrowDate,dateToReturn,returnDate from borrow,user,book where borrow.userId = user.userid and borrow.bookId = book.bookId
select remain from book where bookISBN = #{isbn}
select userBorrowNum from user where userCardNum = #{cardnum}
select bookId from book where bookISBN = #{isbn}
select userid from user where userCardNum = #{cardnum}
mapper.update: update book set remain = remain - 1 where bookId = #{id}
